Text:
The URL above is simply my WordPress site. I noticed when I did a Google search tonight that there is a 2010 Movie by this title, and I wanted to clarify. Wintersbutterfly is a line from one of my poems...I watch the leafs dance past me in the bitter wind like winter's butterflies.
I posted these in a way to thank TPB. I had posted something two years ago and just wanted to follow up.
